DOC.brief_summary: This study is the first hospital-based, cross-sectional study to discuss the prevalence of obesity among 710 inpatients with schizophrenia.
DOC.brief_title: The Prevalence of Obesity For Schizophrenia Inpatients in Taiwan
DOC.criteria: 1. diagnosis as ICD 295 2. Living in rehabilitation ward during 2010/03/22~2010/04/02
